name: I don't need hero!
description:
I don't need a hero is an adventure game made in one week for the Bored Pixels Jam.  The theme was : "You are not the hero"

___________________________________________________________

🕹️ Controls

⌨️ Arrow keys, Q W E R

🎮 The controller is not working for now, we might fix it soon

__________________________________________________________

📜 Credits

👨‍💻  Programming : Kolyne

🎨 Art  : Vanish

🎵 Sound Design : EvilDuckk 👉 Soundcloud                                                  👉Sound Assets for this game

__________________________________________________________

⚠️ Warnings ⚠️

• This game is an early prototype, so you'll probably encounter some bugs here and there. We are currently working on it but we would appreciate if you can leave us a feedback in the comments 🙏

• The hook is buggy so far, especially if you try to use it on a slime.

• After getting the bow you will get stuck. We made it so we can update the game in a very short time. A new zone and a boss will be added very soon !
